Articles.Content:
Yes, another "Really really tall building" rip-off... A train this time. Example:

User 1: Car 57: A car full of mail

User 2: Car 58: A car full of passengers 

And so on...

And remember, no skipping, no going back, you're only going towards the back. I'll start off.

Car 1: The train engine itself.

Car 2: A car filled with cryogenic stasis pods, each one containing Kerbals.

Also (yes, I get to say it!)...

FIRST!
